headline: What Analysts Think Is Resetting The Story For Clorox (CLX)
summary: The latest update on Clorox trims the modelled fair value estimate slightly, from US$124.59 to US$122.41, as analysts factor in softer revenue growth assumptions of 1.39% versus 1.43% previously. This small adjustment reflects a tug of war between cautious views, tied to weaker Q1 results and a lower end EPS outlook, and more constructive voices who see reset expectations and clustered targets in the low to mid US$120s as a sign that the story is being recalibrated rather than abandoned. Stay...

headline: Morgan Stanley files for bitcoin, solana ETFs in digital assets push
summary: Morgan Stanley is seeking regulatory approval to launch exchange-traded funds tied to the price of cryptocurrency tokens, ​according to filings with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission ‌on Tuesday, the first such move by a big U.S. bank.  Regulatory clarity under U.S. President Donald Trump has encouraged mainstream finance companies ⁠to embrace digital assets, which ‌were once considered merely speculative instruments.  In December, the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency also allowed banks ‍to act as intermediaries on crypto transactions, narrowing the gap between the traditional sector and digital assets.
